sqlinfo.sql: INSERT INTO jy_material_use ( jy_material_id, use_user, use_date, use_number, status, remark, inputuser, crt_date, crt_time ) VALUES ( $N{jy_material_id}, $N{sys_user_id}, $S{use_date}, $N{use_number}, 1, $S{remark}, $N{sys_user_id}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{SYSTIME} );

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询当前用户物资使用信息
查询当前用户物资使用信息
查询当前用户物资持有信息（申请物资数量）
sqlinfo.sql:
SELECT t1.jy_material_id, sum(t1.apply_number) apply_number, t2.`code` material_code, t2.`name` material_name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` material_type_name FROM jy_apply t0 LEFT JOIN jy_apply_detail t1 ON t0.id = t1.jy_apply_id LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id WHERE t0.`status` = 4 and ( t0.apply_user = $N{sys_user_id} ) AND ( $ISNULL{jy_material_id} OR t1.jy_material_id = $N{jy_material_id} )
GROUP BY t1.jy_material_id
